title: VCMI skill format
description: Format used to replace bonuses provided by secondary skills in VCMI

skillBonus.description: Set of bonuses provided by skill at given level

scenarioBonus.description: 58x64 skill icon for use as campaign scenario bonus

index.description: Internal, numeric id of skill, required for existing skills

obligatoryMajor.description: This skill is major obligatory (like H3 Wisdom)

obligatoryMinor.description: This skill is minor obligatory (like H3 Magic school)

specialty.description: List of bonuses that are affected by hero specialty

gainChance.description: Chance for the skill to be offered on level-up (heroClass may override)

might.description: Chance for hero classes with might affinity

magic.description: Chance for hero classes with magic affinity

base.description: will be merged with all levels

onlyOnWaterMap.description: It true, skill won't be available on a map without water

special.description: If true, skill is not available on maps at random
